pinyin: da3 ji1 she4 hui4 cai2 fu4

sentences.english: John has a windfall . It surprises his wife greatly .
sentences.chinese: 約翰意外獲得一筆財富，使他夫人大喫一驚。

sentences.english: He pillaged the country of its treasures and of its best people.
sentences.chinese: 他掠奪了這個國家的財富和百姓中的精英。

sentences.english: Within three years he accumulated great wealth by speculations in stocks.
sentences.chinese: 三年內他靠炒買股票積聚了大量財富。

sentences.english: Money can be good or bad, but prajna is always good.
sentences.chinese: 財富有善有惡，般若則無有不善。

sentences.english: Silver, gold and platinum cards denote wealth classes.
sentences.chinese: 銀卡，金卡和白金卡標誌着不同的財富階層。

sentences.english: Chinese government is popular with the people because the government brings stability and wealth to the people.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府卻因爲爲人民帶來了穩定和財富而深得民心。

sentences.english: Wealth empowered him to live a comfortable life.
sentences.chinese: 財富使他能夠過舒適的生活。

sentences.english: Tariffs redistributed wealth from the South to the North.
sentences.chinese: 關稅使得財富從南方流向北方。

sentences.english: Ad pages have declined even more at Fortune and BusinessWeek.
sentences.chinese: 《財富》和《商業週刊》的廣告頁數下降更多。

sentences.english: Tea is one of the greatest cultural treasures of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 茶是中華文明最寶貴的文化財富之一。

sentences.english: Their wealth depends on China, their security on America.
sentences.chinese: 他們的財富依靠中國，安全卻依靠美國。

sentences.english: These patricians don’t need gaudy symbols to advertise their wealth.
sentences.chinese: 這羣貴族並不需要花俏的商標來炫耀他們的財富。

sentences.english: For centuries, Chinese wealth and power dwarfed the West’s.
sentences.chinese: 在好幾個世紀裏，中國的財富和權勢傲視西方。

sentences.english: Fortune Plaza, Building C, 10th Floor, No. 6 Dayelu, Jinjiang District, Chengdu.
sentences.chinese: 成都市，錦江區大業路6號，財富中心C樓10層。

sentences.english: This is the most precious treasure of which Dragon & Lion takes the utmost pride.
sentences.chinese: 這是龍獅最爲自豪和值得驕傲的寶貴財富。

sentences.english: But Putin has deftly managed the windfall and spread the wealth enough so that people feel hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 普京確實致力於將財富分散，所以人們覺得有盼頭。

definition: to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
